question: Who was defeated by James J. Corbett in 1892 to clinch the title of "first world boxing heavyweight champion under the Queensberry Rules"?
explanation: John L. Sullivan was defeated by James J. Corbett in 1892 to clinch the title of "first world boxing heavyweight champion under the Queensberry Rules". The first world heavyweight champion under the Queensberry Rules was "Gentleman Jim" Corbett, who defeated John L. Sullivan in 1892 at the Pelican Athletic Club in New Orleans.
